v0.1.0 2014/03/11 -- Initial release
v0.1.1 2014/04/01 -- Modified README and made links to documentation and tutorial
v0.1.3 2014/04/02 -- Fixed setup.py and modified required version of matplotlib, so that it now actually works. Sorry everyone!
v0.1.6 2014/10/14 -- Added APBS and DCBS burst search algorithms.
v0.1.6.1 2014/10/15 -- Updated readme.
v0.1.7 2014/10/23 -- Added RASP analsyis of bursts.
v0.1.7.1 2014/10/23 -- Removed irritating import message.
v0.1.8 2015/01/19 -- Added support for multiple gaussian fits.
